name: Fabric (MCR Alpine, Autoupdating) [v1.1 beta]
author: ddd@jcx.ovh
description: Fabric is a lightweight, experimental modding toolchain for Minecraft.

variables.name: (Optional) Minecraft / Fabric Loader / Fabric Installer versions
variables.description:
The versions of minecraft, the fabric loader, and the fabric installer (seperated by a slash "/") (e.g. "1.18.2/0.14.5/0.10.2") to download. 

Leave blank to always get the latest (stable) versions.

variables.name: (Optional) Override Jar Path
variables.description: Set this value to the path of a jar (/home/container/$X) to skip the automatic download and run it directly.
